events.name: onFocus
events.description: Handler that is called when the element receives focus.
events.description_zh: 元素接收焦点时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onBlur
events.description: Handler that is called when the element loses focus.
events.description_zh: 元素失去焦点时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onFocusChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's focus status changes.
events.description_zh: 当元素的焦点状态更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onKeyDown
events.description: Handler that is called when a key is pressed.
events.description_zh: 按下某个键时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onKeyUp
events.description: Handler that is called when a key is released.
events.description_zh: 释放密钥时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPress
events.description: Handler called when the press is released over the target.
events.description_zh: 当压力机释放到目标上方时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressStart
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction starts.
events.description_zh: 在新闻交互开始时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressEnd
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction ends, either over the target or when the pointer leaves the target.
events.description_zh: 当按下交互结束时（在目标上方或指针离开目标时）调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressChange
events.description: Handler called when the press state changes.
events.description_zh: 当按下状态更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressUp
events.description: Handler called when a press is released over the target, regardless of whether it started on the target or not.
events.description_zh: 当按下在目标上释放时调用的处理程序，无论它是否在目标上启动。

events.name: onClick
events.description: The native button click event handler (**Deprecated**) use **onPress** instead.
events.description_zh: 本机按钮单击事件处理程序 （**已弃用**） 改用 **onPress**。

:indicator.description: The accordion item `expanded` indicator, usually an arrow icon.
:indicator.description_zh: 手风琴项“展开”指示器，通常为箭头图标。

:startContent.description: The accordion item start content, usually an icon or avatar.
:startContent.description_zh: 手风琴项的开始内容，通常是图标或头像。

:motionProps.description: The props to modify the framer motion animation. Use the `variants` API to create your own animation.
:motionProps.description_zh: 用于修改成帧器运动动画的道具。使用“变体”API 创建您自己的动画。

keepContentMounted.description: Whether the AccordionItem content is kept mounted when closed.
keepContentMounted.description_zh: 关闭时是否保持装入 AccordionItem 内容。

hideIndicator.description: Whether the AccordionItem indicator is hidden.
hideIndicator.description_zh: AccordionItem 指示器是否处于隐藏状态。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the AccordionItem animation is disabled.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否禁用 AccordionItem 动画。

disableIndicatorAnimation.description: Whether the AccordionItem indicator animation is disabled.
disableIndicatorAnimation.description_zh: 是否禁用 AccordionItem 指示器动画。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the accordion item slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为折叠项插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: trigger
slots.description: : The button that open/close the accordion item.
slots.description_zh: ：打开/关闭折叠式项目的按钮。

slots.name: startContent
slots.description: : The content before the accordion item.

slots.name: indicator
slots.description: : The element that indicates the open/close state of the accordion item.
slots.description_zh: ：指示折叠式项的打开/关闭状态的元素。
